main.title: Game Hub
main.subtitle: Welcome to the ultimate gaming experience! Choose your favorite game and have fun!

hangman.title: Hangman Game
hangman.description: Guess the word before the hangman is complete!

ticTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: Classic X and O game. Challenge yourself!

memory.title: Memory Match
memory.description: Test your memory by matching card pairs!

whackAMole.title: Whack-a-Mole
whackAMole.description: Click the mole before it disappears!

typingSpeed.title: Typing Speed Test
typingSpeed.description: Type words as fast as possible!

reactionTime.title: Reaction Time Test
reactionTime.description: Click when the screen turns green!

football.title: Football Guesser
football.description: Guess the football player with AI!

footballGuesser.title: Football Guesser
footballGuesser.subtitle: Can you guess the football player in 10 questions?

instructions.1: AI will secretly choose a football player
instructions.3: Questions about club, nationality, position, etc.
instructions.4: Try to guess the player's name

messages.aiReady: AI has secretly chosen a football player. You have 10 questions to guess who it is!
messages.askQuestions: Ask yes/no questions about nationality, club, position, achievements, etc.
messages.connectionError: Error: Unable to connect to AI. Please check your internet connection.
messages.askDetailed: Please ask a more detailed question.
messages.guessDetected: Detected a player guess! Use the "Guess Player" button below.
messages.unclearResponse: AI response unclear. Question not counted. Please rephrase.
messages.canGuessNow: Tip: You can start making guesses using the guess button below!
messages.threeLeft: Only 3 questions left! Use the "Guess Player" option.
messages.networkError: Network error. Your question was not counted. Please try again.
messages.validName: Please enter a valid player name.
